messages.title: On May 6, every vote counts in deciding who will be First Minister.

images.caption: On May 6, every vote counts in deciding who will be First Minister.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet puts a significant focus on the importance of every vote for deciding the First Minister, highlighting a personalized political strategy centered around Nicola Sturgeon for the SNP. It also emphasizes the protection of the NHS, indicating it as a key policy area. There is no additional policy information, personal details about the candidate, or other issues mentioned on this page of the leaflet.
